bug.short_desc: vinagre does not pass through keyboard shortcuts
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: F24 vinagre does not pass through keyboard shortcuts to the remote session, interpreting them instead even in fullscreen mode. This is a regression from previous versions of Fedora.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): vinagre-3.20.2.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Connect to a machine in fullscreen mode. 2. Run e.g. nano on a text file 3. Within nano, press ^W (find string in open file)
Actual results: Remote session is disconnected.
Expected results: Key sequence is passed through, causing nano to prompt for a search string.
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
